name: Unidentified_Iktotchi_Jedi
content: An Iktotchi Jedi served the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. Alongside Jedi Master Kantam Sy, the Iktotchi Jedi aided in the evacuation of the cruiser the Voyager Dawn after it was damaged in the aftermath of the Great Hyperspace Disaster. The Jedi gathered the evacuees in the ship's docking bay as they awaited rescue.
